text:
AIADMK general secretary Jayalalithaa’s confidante Sasikala offered prayers at Nagaraja Temple here on Sunday.

According to sources, she came to the temple around 3.30 a.m. and witnessed the first ashtabishkem from 3.55 a.m. She came alone with securities in a private vehicle and left immediately after offering prayers, sources in the HR and CE department said.
title: Sasikala in Nagaraja temple
